page.title: 16The Community Tutor
page.content: The Community Tutor considers her main function in the local community is to find out what people want like an institute or club of some sort.She also tries to solve their problems and to help them.A typical day for her would be rather hectic.She said she would tell us about today as her typical day.First of all she came to our school to tell us about her job as a Community Tutor,then she would go to her office at Cherry Hinton Community School,Cambridge.She would write a few letters to invite anybody who would be interested to help in the Cherry Hinton Festival.She will also get some telephone calls about the same thing.People are most likely to drop in for all different reasons.Then she will go to a meeting in the evening about community matters.
